pkgmetadata.longdescription: ==================================================sgmllib3k -- Py3k port of the old stdlib module==================================================sgmllib was dropped in Python 3. For those depending on it, that's somewhat unfortunate. This is a quick and dirty port of this old module. I just ran 2to3 on it and published it. I don't intend to maintain it, so it might be a good idea to eventually think about finding another module to use.
